meanings.sent1: The lamination of the photos made them shiny and protected.
meanings.sent2: I used lamination to preserve my important documents.
meanings.sent3: The lamination machine seemed to be in a playful mood today.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a lamination, covering her sadness with a glossy finish.
meanings.sent5: The lamination of the cake with frosting made it look irresistible.

meanings.definition: A layer of material that has been laminated.
meanings.sent1: The lamination on the floor made it easy to clean.
meanings.sent2: The lamination on the table protected it from spills.
meanings.sent3: The lamination on the book cover was feeling quite proud of itself.
meanings.sent4: The lamination on the leaves made them look like they were coated in glass.
meanings.sent5: The lamination on the badge made it shiny and eye-catching.

meanings.definition: The act or process of laminating.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the lamination of my artwork to make it last longer.
meanings.sent2: The lamination of the ID cards was done with precision.
meanings.sent3: The lamination process felt like a dance of layers coming together.
meanings.sent4: Her words were a lamination of truth and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The lamination of the map made it durable for our hiking trip.
